verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye the <S%H3050>LORD:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> it is <S%H2896>good<s%> to sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> unto our <S%H430>God;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> it is <S%H5273>pleasant;<s%> and <S%H8416>praise<s%> is <S%H5000>comely.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> doth build <S%H1129>up<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> he gathereth <S%H3664>together<s%> the <S%H1760>outcasts<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
He <S%H7495>healeth<s%> the <S%H7665>broken<s%> in <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and bindeth <S%H2280>up<s%> their <S%H6094>wounds.<s%>
He <S%H4487>telleth<s%> the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H3556>stars;<s%> he <S%H7121>calleth<s%> them <S%H3605>all<s%> by their <S%H8034>names.<s%>
Great <S%H1419><s%> is our <S%H113>Lord,<s%> and of <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H3581>power:<s%> his <S%H8394>understanding<s%> is <S%H369>infinite.<s%> <S%H4557><s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> lifteth <S%H5749>up<s%> the <S%H6035>meek:<s%> he casteth the wicked <S%H8213>down<s%> <S%H7563><s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> the <S%H776>ground.<s%>
Sing <S%H6030><s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> with <S%H8426>thanksgiving;<s%> sing <S%H2167>praise<s%> upon the <S%H3658>harp<s%> unto our God: <S%H430><s%>

Who <S%H3680>covereth<s%> the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> with <S%H5645>clouds,<s%> who <S%H3559>prepareth<s%> <S%H4306>rain<s%> for the <S%H776>earth,<s%> who maketh <S%H2682>grass<s%> to <S%H6779>grow<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mountains.<s%>
He <S%H5414>giveth<s%> to the <S%H929>beast<s%> his <S%H3899>food,<s%> and to the <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H6158>ravens<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H7121>cry.<s%>
He <S%H2654>delighteth<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> in the <S%H1369>strength<s%> of the <S%H5483>horse:<s%> he taketh not <S%H3808>pleasure<s%> <S%H7521><s%> in the <S%H7785>legs<s%> of a <S%H376>man.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> taketh pleasure <S%H7521>in<s%> <S%H853><s%> them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> him, <S%H853>in<s%> those that <S%H3176>hope<s%> in his <S%H2617>mercy.<s%>
Praise <S%H7623><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> O <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> <S%H1984>praise<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> O <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> he hath <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> the <S%H1280>bars<s%> of thy <S%H8179>gates;<s%> he hath <S%H1288>blessed<s%> thy <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> thee.
He <S%H7760>maketh<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> in thy <S%H1366>borders,<s%> and <S%H7646>filleth<s%> thee with the <S%H2459>finest<s%> of the <S%H2406>wheat.<s%>
He sendeth <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H565>commandment<s%> upon <S%H776>earth:<s%> his <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7323>runneth<s%> <S%H5704>very<s%> <S%H4120>swiftly.<s%>
He <S%H5414>giveth<s%> <S%H7950>snow<s%> like <S%H6785>wool:<s%> he <S%H6340>scattereth<s%> the <S%H3713>hoarfrost<s%> like <S%H665>ashes.<s%>
He casteth <S%H7993>forth<s%> his <S%H7140>ice<s%> like <S%H6595>morsels:<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> can <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H7135>cold?<s%>
He sendeth <S%H7971>out<s%> his <S%H1697>word,<s%> and <S%H4529>melteth<s%> them: he causeth his <S%H7307>wind<s%> to <S%H5380>blow,<s%> and the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H5140>flow.<s%>
He <S%H5046>showeth<s%> his <S%H1697>word<s%> unto <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> his <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and his <S%H4941>judgments<s%> unto <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

He hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6213>dealt<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> with <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H1471>nation:<s%> and as for his <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> they have <S%H1077>not<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> them. <S%H1984>Praise<s%> ye the <S%H3050>LORD.<s%>
